allow:
Bash(echo "Available Commands:

1. help - Show this list of commands
2. correct-course - Execute course correction task  
3. create-epic - Create epic for brownfield projects
4. create-story - Create user story from requirements
5. doc-out - Output full document to current destination file
6. execute-checklist-po - Run PO master checklist
7. shard-doc {document} {destination} - Shard document to destination
8. validate-story-draft {story} - Validate story file
9. yolo - Toggle Yolo Mode (skip doc confirmations)
10. exit - Exit agent mode

Simply type the number or command name (with * prefix) to execute!")
